trans-unit.source: Explore data in Azure blob storage with Pandas | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Explore data in Azure blob storage with Pandas | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: How to explore data that is stored in Azure blob container using Pandas.
trans-unit.target: How to explore data that is stored in Azure blob container using Pandas.

trans-unit.source: Explore data in Azure blob storage with Pandas
trans-unit.target: Explore data in Azure blob storage with Pandas

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: Introduction

trans-unit.source: This document covers how to explore data that is stored in Azure blob container using [Pandas](http://pandas.pydata.org/) Python package.
trans-unit.target: This document covers how to explore data that is stored in Azure blob container using [Pandas](http://pandas.pydata.org/) Python package.

trans-unit.source: The **menu** below links to topics that describe how to use tools to explore data from various storage environments.
trans-unit.target: The **menu** below links to topics that describe how to use tools to explore data from various storage environments.

trans-unit.source: This task is a step in the Cortana Analytics Process (CAP).
trans-unit.target: This task is a step in the Cortana Analytics Process (CAP).

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: This article assumes that you have:
trans-unit.target: This article assumes that you have:

trans-unit.source: Created an Azure storage account.
trans-unit.target: Created an Azure storage account.

trans-unit.source: If you need instructions, see [Create an Azure Storage account](../hdinsight-get-started.md#storage)
trans-unit.target: If you need instructions, see [Create an Azure Storage account](../hdinsight-get-started.md#storage)

trans-unit.source: Stored your data in an Azure blob storage account.
trans-unit.target: Stored your data in an Azure blob storage account.

trans-unit.source: Load the data into a Pandas data frame
trans-unit.target: Load the data into a Pandas data frame

trans-unit.source: In order to do explore and manipulate a dataset, it must be downloaded from the blob source to a local file which can then be loaded in a Pandas data frame.
trans-unit.target: In order to do explore and manipulate a dataset, it must be downloaded from the blob source to a local file which can then be loaded in a Pandas data frame.

trans-unit.source: Here are the steps to follow for this procedure:
trans-unit.target: Here are the steps to follow for this procedure:

trans-unit.source: Download the data from Azure blob with the following Python code sample using blob service.
trans-unit.target: Download the data from Azure blob with the following Python code sample using blob service.

trans-unit.source: Replace the variable in the code below with your specific values:
trans-unit.target: Replace the variable in the code below with your specific values:

trans-unit.source: Read the data into a Pandas data-frame from the downloaded file.
trans-unit.target: Read the data into a Pandas data-frame from the downloaded file.

trans-unit.source: Now you are ready to explore the data and generate features on this dataset.
trans-unit.target: Now you are ready to explore the data and generate features on this dataset.
